words.def: keep or maintain in unaltered condition
robbery at gunpoint
the act of grasping
A woman's hairdo in which most hair is kept above the neck.
the act of walking with a slow heavy gait
A mass of iron in a pasty condition gathered into a ball for the tilt hammer  or rolls.
characterized by or producing sound of great volume or intensity
the act of hopping
an open box attached to a long pole handle
(British) the dessert course of a meal (`pud' is used informally)
the vessel that contains the seeds of a plant (not the seeds themselves)
To open.
cut off from a whole
a person active in party politics
100 puls equal 1 afghani in Afghanistan
past times (especially in the phrase `in days of old')
An Arabic and Turkish plucked string instrument  resembling a lute.
two items of the same kind
a unit of pain intensity
a trivalent metallic element of the rare earth group
An occurrence of the interjection "uh".
a midwestern state in north central United States in the Great Lakes region
City in Burkina Faso (Proper noun)
raise
op Op art ; a style of abstract art.
a doctor's degree in optometry
an uproarious party
